data.title: OntarioLearn
data.text:
It’s the most impressive collection of shared online post-secondary courses in North America, right at your fingertips. All 24 of Ontario’s publicly-funded colleges work together in OntarioLearn to offer you easy access to a wide variety of high-quality courses, programs and services online. Search our inventory to find your online course or program at a preferred start date, register with one of our member institutions offering it, and log in to our Portal for one-stop access to your learning.

It’s a connection to the courses you want and need, no matter where you live and no matter where it’s offered across Ontario. If you live in Sudbury, you can take a course taught by our instructor in Kingston. Live in London? Meet deadlines for our course facilitated in Toronto. And, we’re here to help with dedicated support specialists 24/7/365.

It’s a leader in the delivery of high-quality online education for more than 25 years. Whether you’re upgrading skills, working towards a micro credential, certificate, diploma, or degree, improving your job prospects or seeking specialized professional development, you’ll find the online courses and programs you’re looking for at OntarioLearn. You’ll be joining an extensive network of students who have chosen to study with us as OntarioLearn has supported nearly 1 million course enrollments since our early days as a start-up in 1994.
